com.gcssloop.view.utils

类 DensityUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gcssloop.view.utils.DensityUtils

  • public class DensityUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A utils of screen density.

    it can help you convert the different unit.

    E.g: dp -> px ps->dp sp->px px->sp

    Author: GcsSloop

    Created Date: 16/5/24

    Copyright (C) 2016 GcsSloop.

    GitHub: https://github.com/GcsSloop

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      DensityUtils() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static int dip2px(Context context, float dpValue)
      convert the dp to px depend on the device density.
      static float getDensity(Context context)
      get the density of device screen.
      static float getFontDensity(Context context)
      get the scale density of device screen.
      static int px2dip(Context context, float pxValue)
      convert the px to dp depend on the device density.
      static int px2sp(Context context, float pxValue)
      convert the px to sp depend on the device scaledDensity.
      static int sp2px(Context context, float spValue)
      convert the sp to px depend on the device scaledDensity.

      • DensityUtils

        public DensityUtils()

    • 方法详细资料

      • dip2px

        public static int dip2px(Context context,
                         float dpValue)
        convert the dp to px depend on the device density.
        参数:
        context - the context
        dpValue - a value of dp
        返回:
        the result of px

      • px2dip

        public static int px2dip(Context context,
                         float pxValue)
        convert the px to dp depend on the device density.
        参数:
        context - the context
        pxValue - a value of px
        返回:
        the result of dp

      • sp2px

        public static int sp2px(Context context,
                        float spValue)
        convert the sp to px depend on the device scaledDensity.
        参数:
        context - the context
        spValue - a value of sp
        返回:
        the result of px

      • px2sp

        public static int px2sp(Context context,
                        float pxValue)
        convert the px to sp depend on the device scaledDensity.
        参数:
        context - the context
        pxValue - a value of px
        返回:
        the result of sp

      • getDensity

        public static float getDensity(Context context)
        get the density of device screen.
        参数:
        context - the context
        返回:
        the screen density

      • getFontDensity

        public static float getFontDensity(Context context)
        get the scale density of device screen. usually this value is the same as density. but it can adjust by user.
        参数:
        context - the context
        返回:
        the screen scale density.
